_v.en: All praise belongs to Allah, Lord of all the worlds,
Master of the Day of Retribution.
You [alone] do we worship, and to You [alone] do we turn for help.
Guide us on the straight path,

_v.ar: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
_v.en: the path of those whom You have blessed — such as have not incurred Your wrath, nor are astray.
